def turn(state):
    # New question.
    results = []
    for x, y in get2idxs(idxs):
        check_xy_close = all_close([x,y], ctx)
        check_xy_large = all([is_large(dot, ctx) for dot in [x,y]])
        check_xy_light_grey = all([is_light(dot, ctx) and is_grey(dot, ctx) for dot in [x,y]])
        check_y_smaller_x = is_smaller(y, x, ctx)
        check_y_below_right_x = is_below(y, x, ctx) and is_right(y, x, ctx)
        if (
            check_xy_close
            and check_xy_large
            and check_xy_light_grey
            and check_y_smaller_x
            and check_y_below_right_x
        ):
            results.append([x,y])
    return results

def turn(state):
    # New question.
    results = []
    for x, y, z in get3idxs(idxs):
        check_xyz_line = is_line([x,y,z], ctx)
        check_x_top = x == get_top([x,y,z], ctx)
        check_x_dark = is_dark(x, ctx)
        check_y_middle = y == get_middle([x,y,z], ctx)
        check_y_light_grey = is_light(y, ctx) and is_grey(y, ctx)
        check_y_larger_x = is_larger(y, x, ctx)
        check_z_right = z == get_right([x,y,z], ctx)
        check_z_smaller_y = is_smaller(z, y, ctx)
        check_z_darker_y = is_darker(z, y, ctx) and not is_dark(z, ctx)
        if (
            check_xyz_line
            and check_x_top
            and check_x_dark
            and check_y_middle
            and check_y_light_grey
            and check_y_larger_x
            and check_z_right
            and check_z_smaller_y
            and check_z_darker_y
        ):
            results.append([x,y,z])
    return results
state = turn(state)

def turn(state):

    results = []

        check_xy_light_grey = all([is_light(dot, ctx) and is_grey(dot, ctx) for dot in [x,y]])
        check_y_smaller_x = is_smaller(y, x, ctx)
        check_y_above_left_x = is_above(y, x, ctx) and is_left(y, x, ctx)
        check_x_dark = is_dark(x, ctx)
        check_x_smaller_y = is_smaller(x, y, ctx)
        check_x_above_right_y = is_above(x, y, ctx) and is_right(x, y, ctx)
        check_x_darker_top = is_darker(x, get_top([x,y], ctx), ctx)
        if (
            check_xy_close
            and check_xy_large
            and check_xy_light_grey
            and check_y_smaller_x
            and check_y_above_left_x
            and check_x_dark
            and check_x_smaller_y
            and check_x_above_right_y
            and check_x_darker_top
        ):
            results.append([x,y])
    return results
